name: Passive Aggression
description:
A top down shooter game where your goal is to measure the size of universe but wait in order to do that you have to enter alien Airspace, Vacuumspace, or Spacespace?

W, A, S, D - Move your ship

Left Click - Shoot

R - Reload

Credits:

kenney.nl - Sprites, Fonts, and Sound Effects

This is my first game published to itch.io and I'm still learning all criticism are welcome.
